revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=ASUS |model=RT-AC68 |revision=U Extreme |asin= |newegg= |series=AC2900 |fcc_date=04/20/2017 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Arcadyan |manuf_model=WG9117B |manuf_rev=AC44 -ASU |availability=now |type=wireless router |fcc_id=MSQ-RTACHN00 |pcb_id= |pwr_v=19 |pwr_amp=1.75 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM4906;BCM4906KFEBG, TK1620, P55W-01 N2AW; |cpu1_cspeed=1.8 GHz |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=256 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=NAND |ram1=512 |ram1_brand=Micron |ram1_model=MT41K256M16TW-107:P |expansion_if_types=USB 3.1 (Gen 1), USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=2 |jtag=yes,, 10-pad header,, |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM4366E;BCM4366EKMMLG; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL, RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=4 |wi1_rxchains=4 |wi1_sstreams=4 |wi2_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi2_chip1_model=BCM4365E;BCM4365EKMMLG; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_ant_conn=RP-SMA |wi2_txchains=3 |wi2_rxchains=3 |wi2_sstreams=3 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags=Wave2, MU-MIMO, DFS (master), AiMesh, |stock_boot=CFE |stock_os=Linux |tp_firmware=Asuswrt-Merlin |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid=ASUS_XX_2G,ASUS_XX_5G |default_ssid_regex=^ASUS_[0-9A-Fa-f]{2}_2G$,,,^ASUS_[0-9A-Fa-f]{2}_5G$ |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui= |oui_eth= }}
:• '''2167''' Mbps max PHY rate for the 80MHz wide 5GHz channel, :• '''750''' Mbps max. PHY rate for the 40MHz wide 2.4GHz channel = '''''2900 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|AC2900 Dual-Band Gigabit Wi-Fi Router}} :{{ProductPage|https://www.asus.com/Gaming-Networking/RT-AC86U/}} (RT-AC86U) {{SupportPage|vendor=ASUS|model=RT-AC86U}} "RT-AC86U REV 1.40" and "1650" is silkscreened on the [https://fccid.io/document.php?id=3365350 board]. *Web GUI: http://router.asus.com According to the ''[https://fccid.io/document.php?id=3365365 Model Names Confirmation Letter]'' at the FCC: {{Quote|text=Model No: *'''[[ASUS RT-AC86U]]''' (RT-AC86A/RT-AC86P/RT-AC86R/RT-AC86X) *[[ASUS RT-AC68U Extreme]], [[ASUS RT-AC2900]] (ASUS AC2900) :are identical in electrical, mechanical and physical design. The difference between these models is only for marketing purpose.}} {{see also|ASUS RT-AC86U|ASUS RT-AC68U|Arcadyan}} ''XX in the default SSID refers to the last two digits of 2.4GHz :MAC address found on the label on the back of the router.'' A Class II Permissive Change Letter submitted to the FCC 11/14/2017 :indicates two major changes to the product: *1. Add WLAN 5G band 2 and band 3 functions (DFS) *2. Add Mesh function. ([https://www.asus.com/aimesh/ AiMesh]) ===Forum threads=== *[https://www.snbforums.com/threads/rt-ac86u-hit-the-fcc.38770/ ''ASUS RT-AC86U'' on '''SNB''' forums] (RMerlin) *[https://openitforum.pl/forums/topic/1780-asus-rt-ac86u-wireless-ac2900-dual-band-gigabit-router/ ''ASUS RT-AC86U'' on '''OpenITforum'''] (PL) *[https://www.asus.com/tw/forum/list?aid=74446 ''ASUS RT-AC86U'' on '''Asus''' forums] (TW) *[http://www.asussmart.com/smart/557.html ''ASUS RT-AC86U'' on '''AsusSmart'''] (CN) ===See also=== [[List of MU-MIMO supported devices]] *[[ASUS GT-AC9600]] - ''ROG Rapture Aura 10G Gaming Router'' *[[ASUS GT-AC5300]] - ''ROG Rapture Tri-Band Gaming Router'' *[[ASUS ROG Areion 10G]] - ''10GbE PCI-Express LAN Card'' __NOTOC__
